messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: During a late-night patrol, Officer Martinez observed a suspicious vehicle in the downtown area. He requested backup, and Sergeant Clarke and Patrol Officer Lee arrived shortly after. The team conducted a thorough inspection of the vehicle. Meanwhile, Detective Green, who was investigating a series of car thefts, was notified of the discovery. He quickly joined the scene with Technician Morgan, an expert in automotive forensics. Together, they found evidence linking the vehicle to recent thefts. 14 Q: What kind of evidence? 15 A: Detective Green found tools commonly used in car thefts. 16 Lieutenant Brooks, in charge of the area, was briefed by Captain Sanders about the situation. 17 Deputy Foster, patrolling the outskirts, was informed of the findings and joined the ongoing investigation. 18 Criminalist Bailey, examining evidence from the scene, identified fingerprints that matched a known suspect. 19 Coroner Dr. Shaw was also called to examine a body found in a nearby area, initially thought to be unrelated but later connected to the investigation. 20 Patrol Officer Gomez, gathering information from locals, uncovered more leads. 21 The coordinated effort among different law enforcement divisions was crucial in piecing together the case. 22 The expertise of each officer, from field patrol to forensic analysis, was instrumental in unraveling the criminal activities linked to the suspect. 23 Officer Martinez's initial observation and the subsequent collaborative response were key to the investigation's success. 24 The police force continues to ensure community safety and apprehend those responsible for criminal acts. 25 The collective efforts of the officers, from initial response to detailed forensic investigation, underscore the importance of teamwork in complex criminal investigations. 26 The case remains active, with new leads being pursued by the dedicated team.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Officer Martinez Officer Context: Observed a suspicious vehicle during a late-night patrol. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Sergeant Clarke Officer Context: Arrived as backup following Officer Martinez's request. Officer Role: Backup Support Officer Name: Patrol Officer Lee Officer Context: Part of the backup team with Sergeant Clarke. Officer Role: Support in Field Operation Officer Name: Detective Green Officer Context: Investigated the scene, found tools used in car thefts. Officer Role: Investigating Detective Officer Name: Technician Morgan Officer Context: Expert in automotive forensics, assisted Detective Green. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Lieutenant Brooks Officer Context: In charge of the area, was briefed about the situation. Officer Role: Area Supervisor Officer Name: Captain Sanders Officer Context: Briefed Lieutenant Brooks about the situation. Officer Role: Commanding Officer Officer Name: Deputy Foster Officer Context: Joined the investigation after being informed of the findings. Officer Role: Investigating Deputy Officer Name: Criminalist Bailey Officer Context: Examined evidence, identified fingerprints of a known suspect. Officer Role: Forensic Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Shaw Officer Context: Called to examine a body related to the investigation. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Gomez Officer Context: Gathered information from locals, uncovering more leads. Officer Role: Community Information Officer
